name: Cubed (itch) (Pinklunatic)
description:
WASD to move

This is  a very early prototype of  a game that I plan to eventually release as a mobile  game.

It was a puzzle game that I actually made in first year of my studies and transitioned to Unity into the second year. 

I wanted people to think about their actions before they make a move as this will influence whether or not they reach their goal.
